content: round 7 *k7 k2tog* continue to end of round round 8 knit all stitches round 9 *k6 k2tog* continue to end of round round 10 knit all stitches round 11 *k5 k2tog* continue to end of round round 12 knit all stitches round 13 *k4 k2tog* continue to end of round round 14 knit all stitches round 15 *k3 k2tog* continue to end of round round 16 knit all stitches round 17 *k2 k2tog* continue to end of round round 18 knit all stitches round 19 *k1 k2tog* continue to end of round round 20 knit all stitches round 21 *k2tog* continue to end of round 8 stitches remain finishing break yarn and secure by threading the long tail through remaining stitches pull tail snug to close the top of the hat block & weave in ends
